price: But they rejected all of Our signs, so We seized them with the grip of the All-Mighty, Most Powerful.
arabic: كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ أَخۡذَ عَزِيزٖ مُّقۡتَدِرٍ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
